entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -19.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
